s.text: The sale of shares to the McAlpine family along with the recent sale of 750,000 shares of Meridian stock to Haden MacLellan Holding PLC of Surrey, England and a recent public offering have increased Meridian's net worth to $8.5 million, said William Feniger, chief executive officer of Toledo, Ohio-based Meridian.
That amount is convertible into shares of Meridian common stock at $2 a share during its one-year term.
Meridian National Corp. said it sold 750,000 shares of its common stock to the McAlpine family interests, for $1 million, or $1.35 a share.
That amount is convertible into shares of Meridian common stock at $2 a share during its one-year term.
Meridian National Corp. said it sold 750,000 shares of its common stock to the McAlpine family interests, for $1 million, or $1.35 a share.
That amount is convertible into shares of Meridian common stock at $2 a share during its one-year term.
